about_the_game:
This is a casual and relaxing little game. A casual gameplay that is simple and easy to learn. By driving the chicks back to their nests, you can earn points and pass the level by reaching the required points.

Rich levels provide a sense of continuous progress and pleasure. The smooth difficulty curve also provides continuous challenges for players who are deeply involved in the game.

In "Lawin Catch The Kim", unlike traditional box pushing games, players need to design a sequence of actions based on the characteristics of the chicken and the location of the chicken nest in a limited time, in order to complete the game in a tight time.

The core operation of the game is similar to pushing boxes, but not limited to pushing boxes. Finding a good perspective and designing a course of action are more crucial.

The cute art style, whether it's the scene, player, or even NPC small animals, is very cute. In the game, I would rather call them friends than NPCs~

As of now, there are as many as 20 challenges, making it difficult to pass all levels.

The expansion space is huge, and levels will be continuously updated in the future to exit new friends who are different from the current NPC action mode.

As the game deepens, the difficulty level does not continuously increase!

Looking forward to challenging all levels and achieving the ultimate success!

Rich levels provide a sense of continuous progress and pleasure. The smooth difficulty curve also provides continuous challenges for players who are deeply involved in the game.

In "Lawin Catch The Kim", unlike traditional box pushing games, players need to design a sequence of actions based on the characteristics of the chicken and the location of the chicken nest in a limited time, in order to complete the game in a tight time.

The core operation of the game is similar to pushing boxes, but not limited to pushing boxes. Finding a good perspective and designing a course of action are more crucial.

The cute art style, whether it's the scene, player, or even NPC small animals, is very cute. In the game, I would rather call them friends than NPCs~

As of now, there are as many as 20 challenges, making it difficult to pass all levels.

The expansion space is huge, and levels will be continuously updated in the future to exit new friends who are different from the current NPC action mode.

As the game deepens, the difficulty level does not continuously increase!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: IOS 10.15
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 560
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: None

name: Lawin Catch The Kim

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce560
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: None

short_description: Lawin Catch The Kim is a fun puzzle game~Chicken Kim never eats and runs wild outside every day. As Kim's good friend, you need to take them all back to the chicken coop and eat obediently! The game is always given 20 levels.Take all Kim home!
supported_languages: English, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain
